EmailTemplate.name: Final Notice for MSP Renewal
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Notice for MSP Renewal «CONTRACT_SAP_CONTRACT_ID»
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
***Please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses***
Dear MSP Customer, Our Honeywell MSP contracts department sent you a MSP renewal package to complete for your aircraft (XXXX), on (MM/DD/YYYY). We have previously sent two reminder notices to your company requesting that the completed documents be returned prior to the expiration date. As of today, we have not received the completed paperwork back from you.
Please note your contract expired on (MM/DD/YYYY) and MSP coverage has been suspended as of that date.
To retroactively reinstate MSP coverage we require your completed renewal documents within 5 business days from the date of this notice.
If we do not receive the signed contracts back by this date we will assume you no longer wish to have MSP coverage on your aircraft and we will review this contract for closure. Once closed, a re-enrollment may be required with applicable fees to return to the program.
Please let the contracts department know if you have any further questions regarding this request. Please sign and email the contract back to mspcontracts@honeywell.com for processing.
Kind regards, {!Contract.OwnerFullName}
MSP Contracts Honeywell Aerospace 1944 E Sky Harbor Circle (M/S 2102-229) Phoenix, AZ 85034 Tel: (602) 365-3099 Opt. 2.4 mspcontracts@honeywell.com
